data.title: Mr and Mrs Eminem divorce for second time
data.meta_description: Eminem, the rap star, and his high school sweetheart, Kim Mathers, have divorced a second time, less than a year after remarrying.
data.text:
Eminem, the rap star, and his high school sweetheart, Kim Mathers, have divorced a second time, less than a year after remarrying.

The two agreed to split their property and share custody of Hailie Jade Scott, 10. The couple were married in 1999, divorced in 2001, remarried on January 14 this year and filed for divorce on April 15. They told the judge they understood the divorce was final, and had "conducted themselves with dignity and respect", he said.

Eminem, 34, declined to comment after the hearing as two men whisked him into a black Cadillac.
